qas.question: What is the grid plan aligned with rather than the cardinal directions?
In this article, how many degrees north of true west is "West?"
Does this article cover east-west or north-south streets?
Which streets have their own linked articles?

context: This article covers numbered <a2_0>east-west<a2_0/> streets in Manhattan, New York City. <a3_0>Major streets<a3_0/> have their own linked articles; minor streets are discussed here. The streets do not run exactly east–west, because the grid plan is aligned with the <a0_0>Hudson River<a0_0/> rather than with the cardinal directions. "West" is approximately <a1_0>29<a1_0/> degrees north of true west.
